item.title: Skiller Cape
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

just to let you know. the code isn’t correct…

if(playerLevel[2] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3777) { // one less so if your 98 or lower u cant wear.

its if(playerLevel[2] < 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3777 {

Why don’t you code it yourself?

1 = Defence
2 = Strength
3 = Hitpoints
4 = Ranged
5 = Prayer
6 = Magic
7 = Cooking
8 = Woodcutting
9 = Fletching
10 = Fishing
11 = Firemaking
12 = Crafting
13 = Smithing
14 = Mining
15 = Herblore
16 = Agility
17 = Thieving
18 = Slayer
19 = Farming
20 = Runecrafting

Read full topic

item.title: Skiller Cape
item.dc:creator: @chazizkool chazizkool
item.description:
@chazizkool wrote:

if(playerLevel[2] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3777) { // one less so if your 98 or lower u cant wear.
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
sendMessage(“You Need 99 Strength To Wear This Cape!”);
}

Can anyone code this so you can only wear the cape only when you have all non-combat stats and here are the the numbers that I want required for the cape 7,9,10,11,13,16,17,20.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 08:00:59 PM[/size][hr]Any1 help?
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 08:12:35 PM[/size][hr]Still need assistance.
